content: I missed the checkoff for pset 1 due to bad planning on my part. Is there anything I can do? What percent of the pset grade is the checkoff?
subject: missed checkoff 1

content: It's 30% of your pset grade, but you can also use a late day.
Thanks for responding - the course info says late days can’t be used for checkoffs. Should I just go to the next office hours and get my pset 1 checkoff and ask for a late day?

<md>just fyi this student came to OH for a checkoff citing this piazza post, although I'm not sure if a late day can actually be used for a checkoff or not (i fully believe it should be allowed for this student, but for the future). can someone confirm the course policy?</md>
You can't use late days on checkoffs.
